dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, hey B, have you seen the latest weather forecast from Kazhydromet? Sounds like we're in for quite a few changes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, hey B, have you seen the latest weather forecast from Kazhydromet? Sounds like we're in for quite a few changes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, um, yeah, I just had a quick look. It's for the 24th, 25th, and 26th, right? Sounds like more of that unstable stuff.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, um, yeah, I just had a quick look. It's for the twenty fourth, twenty fifth, and twenty sixth, right? Sounds like more of that unstable stuff.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazhydromet meteorologists have released the weather forecast for June 24, 25, and 26. A series of active cyclones and associated atmospheric fronts continue to move across Kazakhstan, creating unstable weather conditions in most regions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. They're talking about, like, a whole series of active cyclones and atmospheric fronts still moving across Kazakhstan. So, unstable is definitely the word.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. They're talking about, like, a whole series of active cyclones and atmospheric fronts still moving across Kazakhstan. So, unstable is definitely the word.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A series of active cyclones and associated atmospheric fronts continue to move across Kazakhstan, creating unstable weather conditions in most regions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Ugh, right. And what does that actually mean for us? Is it more rain, [interrupts] thunderstorms?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ugh, right. And what does that actually mean for us? Is it more rain, thunderstorms?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Yeah, pretty much all of that. A new wave of frontal activity is gonna bring rain, thunderstorms, and, uh, some pretty gusty winds too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, pretty much all of that. A new wave of frontal activity is gonna bring rain, thunderstorms, and, uh, some pretty gusty winds too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the coming days, a new wave of frontal activity will bring rain, thunderstorms, and gusty winds.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Gusty winds, lovely. Are we talking just light showers or like, proper downpours?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Gusty winds, lovely. Are we talking just light showers or like, proper downpours?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, that's the thing. Meteorologists are saying in some areas, the precipitation could be really heavy, and they're even expecting possible hail.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, that's the thing. Meteorologists are saying in some areas, the precipitation could be really heavy, and they're even expecting possible hail.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to meteorologists, in some areas the precipitation may be heavy, with possible hail.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Hail? Yikes. Where's that, like, most likely to hit?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hail? Yikes. Where's that, like, most likely to hit?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Primarily, uh, the northern, central, and eastern regions, and then also the mountainous areas down in the southeast.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Primarily, uh, the northern, central, and eastern regions, and then also the mountainous areas down in the southeast.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This is especially expected in the northern, central, eastern regions, and the mountainous areas of the southeast.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so a decent chunk of the country then. And after all that, are we looking at things cooling down a bit?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so a decent chunk of the country then. And after all that, are we looking at things cooling down a bit?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. Following all that rain, cooler air is expected to spread across the country. So, a gradual drop in temperatures.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. Following all that rain, cooler air is expected to spread across the country. So, a gradual drop in temperatures.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Following the rain, cooler air will spread across the country. A gradual drop in temperatures is expected.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, thank goodness. What kind of temperatures are we talking for, say, the north?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, thank goodness. What kind of temperatures are we talking for, say, the north?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: For the north, um, daytime highs are looking like +15 to +23 degrees Celsius.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For the north, um, daytime highs are looking like plus fifteen to plus twenty three degrees Celsius.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's quite a drop! And for the central and east, where it's been pretty warm?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's quite a drop! And for the central and east, where it's been pretty warm?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, for central and east, you're looking at +20 to +28 degrees. Still warm, but not scorching.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, for central and east, you're looking at plus twenty to plus twenty eight degrees. Still warm, but not scorching.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And the south? Like, the real hot spots?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the south? Like, the real hot spots?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Even the south, uh, while still warmer at +25 to +33, it means that early-month heatwave, it's gonna temporarily retreat.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Even the south, uh, while still warmer at plus twenty five to plus thirty three, it means that early-month heatwave, it's gonna temporarily retreat.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: south: +25¦+33ÂC. Thus, the heat that persisted at the beginning of the month will temporarily retreat.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, a temporary reprieve from the heat, then. That's actually pretty good news for a lot of people, I think.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, a temporary reprieve from the heat, then. That's actually pretty good news for a lot of people, I think.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. Just, uh, be ready for the thunderstorms first!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. Just, uh, be ready for the thunderstorms first!
